name: 2048 3D (itch)
description:
HOW TO PLAY: Use your arrow keys to move the tiles. When two tiles with the same number touch, they merge into one!

NOTE: This site is a tribute version of 2048. You can play the original via http://git.io/2048.

Created by Luis Pulido. Based on Gabriele Cirulli's game.

Check out my other games!
